com.avaya.ic.sdk
Interface LoginOptions

All Known Implementing Classes:
LoginOptionsImpl
public interface LoginOptions

Represents the optional parameters that an SDK client can pass when a user logs in to IC.

Nested Class Summary
static class LoginOptions.Operation
           
 
Method Summary
 void addOption(LoginOption.Name name, java.lang.String value)
          Adds a login option.
 java.util.Map getOptions()
          Retrieves all login options.

Method Detail

addOption

void addOption(LoginOption.Name name,
               java.lang.String value)
Adds a login option. If you add the same option more than once, the value of the option will be overidden.

Parameters:
name - The name of the login option.
value - The value of the login option.

removeOption

void removeOption(LoginOption.Name name)
Removes a login option.

Parameters:
name - The name of the login option.

getOptions

java.util.Map getOptions()
Retrieves all login options. The key of each option is the LoginOption name. The value of each option is a String.

Returns:
All login options.
